analysis: The project appears to be a web application with a focus on Egyptian-themed design. The current UI needs improvements to ensure mobile responsiveness, proper button functionality, and a cohesive Egyptian desert color palette. The existing to-dos indicate that there are issues with the mobile menu, button functionality, and CSS styling that need to be addressed.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file with an Egyptian-themed color palette using light desert colors such as sandy beige, warm gold, and deep blue to reflect the Egyptian desert theme.
Fix the SVG data URL to include proper SVG content for Egyptian-themed patterns, ensuring that the patterns are visually appealing and consistent with the theme.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices, ensuring it is responsive and easy to use.
Update the script.js file with the improved mobile menu toggle functionality, including proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions.
Ensure all buttons are functional and styled appropriately, with clear labels and consistent design to match the Egyptian theme.
